name: Construct 1 XL 0.6 nozzle
machine_end_gcode:
;Retract the filament
G92 E1
G1 E-5 F900
;Move nozzle fast
G1 X5 Y369 F15000
;Move Bed Down
G1 Z400 F6000

;Set machine to idle
T-1
M104 S0
M104 S0 ; turn off temperature
M140 S0 ; turn off heatbed
M107 ; turn off fan
M84 ; disable motors
machine_start_gcode:
G90 ; use absolute coordinates
M83 ; extruder relative mode
M106 S0 ; Turn Fan off
M204 S[machine_max_acceleration_extruding] T[machine_max_acceleration_retracting]
M190 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; set bed temp
M109 S160 ; set extruder temp
G28 ; home all
G1 Z15 F6000 ; move the printer down 15mm
G1 Y1.0 Z0.3 F4000 ; move print head up
M109 S[first_layer_temperature] ; set extruder temp

M190 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; wait for bed temp
M109 S[first_layer_temperature] T0 ; wait for extruder temp
;prime the extruder
G1 X5 Y2 Z0.3 F6000; go to edge of build volume
G1 X60 E10 F1000 ;gentle purge start
G1 X110 E25 F1000; heavy purge
G1 X60;
